TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionEditorSheet extends System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet

summary.span: 在设计时表示设计器宿主 UI 中资源表达式属性的设计时编辑器表。

span.span: Represents a design-time editor sheet for the properties of a resource expression in the UI of a designer host at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可视化设计器使用类，该类具有类选择单独的属性的一个资源引用表达式，并将所选的资源表达式属性值合并到资源表达式。The visual designer uses the class with the class to select the individual properties of a resource reference expression, and to combine the selected resource expression property values into a resource expression. 方法返回 对象。The method returns a object. 在表达式对话框中，当您选择的控件属性，并将其绑定到资源表达式时，可视化设计器调用方法。In the expressions dialog box, when you select a control property and bind it to a resource expression, the visual designer calls the method. 可视设计器中使用返回对象来提示和属性。The visual designer uses the returned object to prompt for the and properties. 可视化设计器后选择资源表达式属性，调用方法，将属性合并为一个资源表达式字符串。Once the resource expression properties are selected, the visual designer calls the method to combine the properties into a resource expression string. 属性必须指定在资源表达式中; 它进行索引的资源值。The property must be specified in a resource expression; it indexes the resource value. 属性是可选的。The property is optional. 因为它引用的全局资源文件夹中定义的资源的类键或文件名称。It references the class key or file name that defines the resource in the global resources folder. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将绑定属性控件添加到资源表达式使用。The following code example demonstrates how to bind the property of a control to a resource expression using the . 若要使用的示例：To use the example: 1. 在网站项目中，添加新的资源文件名 Strings.resx 为到 App_GlobalResources 文件夹。In a Web site project, add a new resource file named Strings.resx to the App_GlobalResources folder. 2. 添加名为`myLinkText`Strings.resx 资源文件中，并将值设置为的文本控件。Add a string named `myLinkText` to the Strings.resx resource file, and set the value to the text for a control. 例如，设置`myLinkText`字符串到值`This is a link`。For example, set the `myLinkText` string value to `This is a link`. 3. 在 ASP.NET Web 页中，添加控件。In an ASP.NET Web page, add a control. 4. 在属性网格`Hyperlink`控件中，单击**表达式**，然后单击省略号按钮 (**...)** 以显示表达式的绑定对话框。In the property grid for the `Hyperlink` control, click **Expressions**, and click the ellipsis button (**...)** to display the expression binding dialog box. 5. 选择`Text`属性的控件，并设置**表达式类型**到`Resources`表达式类型。Select the `Text` property of a control, and set **Expression Type** to the `Resources` expression type. 可视化设计器显示由定义的资源表达式属性对象。The visual designer displays the resource expression properties defined by the object. 6. 设置**表达式属性**，如下所示：Set the **Expression Properties** as follows: - 设置**具有**到`Strings`，编译 Strings.resx 资源文件的类名称。Set **ClassKey** to `Strings`, the class name for the compiled Strings.resx resource file. - 设置**ResourceKey**到`myLinkText`，Strings.resx 中的字符串名称。Set **ResourceKey** to `myLinkText`, the string name in Strings.resx. 可视化设计器使用对象分配的资源表达式`Text`属性。The visual designer uses the object to assign the resource expression for the `Text` property. 下面的 aspx 源文件显示使用的资源表达式设置属性值的示例：The following aspx source shows an example of a property value set using a resource expression: [!code-aspx-csharp[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/CS/controlsusingexpressionscs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/VB/controlsusingexpressionsvb.aspx#3)] [!code-xml[ControlsUsingExpressions#3](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ControlsUsingExpressions/Common/controlsusingexpressions.xml#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string expression, class System.IServiceProvider serviceProvider) cil managed
Public Sub New (expression As String, serviceProvider As IServiceProvider)

param.name: expression
param.span: 一个资源表达式，用于初始化表达式编辑器表。

span.span: A resource expression, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.

param.name: serviceProvider
param.span: 一个由设计器宿主提供的服务提供程序实现，用于获取其他设计时服务。

span.span: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始和属性值设置使用的输入`expression`字符串。The initial and property values are set using the input `expression` string. 属性使用输入设置`serviceProvider`实现。The property is set using the input `serviceProvider` implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClassKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置与项目的全局资源文件夹中资源的文件名匹配的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the key that matches the filename for the resource in the project's global resource folder.

value.span: 全局资源文件夹中的资源文件的键。

span.span: The key for a resource file in the global resource folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，全局资源文件位于 App_GlobalResources 文件夹。In [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], global resource files are located in the App_GlobalResources folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetExpression() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetExpression () As String

summary.span: 返回由表达式编辑器表属性值形成的资源表达式。

span.span: Returns a resource expression that is formed by the expression editor sheet property values.

returns.span: 表中当前设置的资源表达式字符串。

span.span: The resource expression string for the current settings in the sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property IsValid As Boolean
public: virtual property bool IsValid { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示资源表达式字符串是否有效。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the resource expression string is valid.

value.span: 如果资源表达式字符串有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the resource expression string is valid; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此基实现始终返回 `true`。This base implementation always returns `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ResourceKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置资源的名称，该名称可用作查找资源值的键。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the resource, which is used as a key to find the resource value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是必需的资源表达式; 它表示资源的名称。The property is required for a resource expression; it indicates the name of the resource. 资源的名称用于在运行时和设计时查找资源，并将其分配给控件属性。The name of the resource is used at both run time and design time to look up a resource and assign it to a control property. 例如，如果属性控件分配给资源表达式`<%$ Resources:Strings, labelText $>`，计算资源表达式和字段分配给`labelText`中的资源值`Strings`类。For example, if the property for a control is assigned to the resource expression `<%$ Resources:Strings, labelText $>`, the resource expression is evaluated and the field is assigned to the `labelText` resource value in the `Strings` class.
